page.para: The pen/guins did not have a house. They need/ed a new home.
They dis/cussed what to do. They de/cid/ed to build a house.
First they built a house from sand. It was a good house.
Oh dear. The sea washed the sand a/way.
Next they built a house from rocks. It was a strong house.
Oh dear. A storm blew the rocks a/way.
Mrs Pen/guin had a good i/de/a. She knew what to do.
Let us use eve/ry/thing on the beach. We can make the best house.
Eve/ry/one worked ver/y hard. They built the most won/der/ful house.
The pen/guins were pleased with their new house. It was a safe home.
